title: The Batman
overview: As a manic killer known as "The Riddler" picks off political figures, Batman joins forces with allies to take him down and stop his reign of terror.

imageSet.title: Batman
imageSet.overview: Gotham City’s Dark Knight begins his war on crime with his first major enemy in Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

imageSet.title: Batman
imageSet.overview: Holy original, Batfans! Here's the movie based on the hit TV show. Adam West plays the Caped Crusader, using bat gadgets galore against such evildoers as the Joker, the Penguin, the Riddler and Catwoman.

imageSet.title: Batman
imageSet.overview: After the Pearl Harbor attack, a pair of costumed secret agents are tasked with foiling a Japanese spy’s plan to mind-control American scientists.

imageSet.title: The Dark Knight Rises
imageSet.overview: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman (Christian Bale), with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman (Anne Hathaway), is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane (Tom Hardy).

imageSet.title: Batman Returns
imageSet.overview: Gotham City trembles at the mercy of The Penguin’s criminal genius, while the Dark Knight meets his match in Catwoman. But is she a friend, or a foe?

imageSet.title: Batman & Robin
imageSet.overview: This was the third follow-up to Tim Burton's Batman (1989), the original revisionist look at the Gotham City legend, as well as the second in the Batman series directed by Joel Schumacher and the first featuring George Clooney as the Caped Crusader; it features not one but two super-villains, and a new heroine to fight crime alongside Bruce Wayne (aka Batman) and Dick Grayson (aka Robin) (Chris...

imageSet.title: Batman Forever
imageSet.overview: An ex-district attorney believes Batman was responsible for the accident that disfigured him.

imageSet.title: Batman Begins
imageSet.overview: After witnessing his parents' death, Bruce learns the art of fighting to confront injustice. When he returns to Gotham as Batman, he must stop a secret society that intends to destroy the city.

imageSet.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
imageSet.overview: As Batman hunts for the escaped Joker, the Clown Prince of Crime attacks the Gordon family to prove a diabolical point mirroring his own fall into madness.

imageSet.title: Son of Batman
imageSet.overview: When Batman learns that he has a son, Damian, who is the grandchild of Ra's Al Ghul, he takes the boy under his wing, hoping to change him from the assassin he was being groomed to be.

imageSet.title: The Dark Knight
imageSet.overview: With the help of Lieutenant Jim Gordon and new district attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to destroy organised crime in Gotham City forever; but they soon find themselves prey to a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker.

imageSet.title: Batman: Under the Red Hood
imageSet.overview: There's a mystery afoot in Gotham City, and Batman must go toe-to-toe with an enigmatic vigilante who goes by the name of Red Hood. Subsequently, old wounds reopen and once buried memories come into the light.

imageSet.title: Batman Ninja
imageSet.overview: Batman and a cast of villains including The Joker are transported back in time to medieval Japan in this ground-breaking anime feature.

imageSet.title: Batman: Hush
imageSet.overview: A mysterious new villain known only as Hush uses a gallery of villains to destroy Batman's crime-fighting career as well as Bruce Wayne's personal life, which has been further complicated by a relationship with Selina Kyle/Catwoman.

imageSet.title: Batman: Year One
imageSet.overview: Experience a bold and dynamic vision of the Dark Knight’s first year in action and the start of his enduring friendship with Jim Gordon.

imageSet.title: Batman & Bill
imageSet.overview: For years, Bob Kane has been credited as Batman's creator. As time passed, rumors swirled that the Caped Crusader had another father.  Who was this man? Batman & Bill tells the story of the uncredited creator of Batman, and a crusade to bring him justice.

imageSet.title: Batman and Robin
imageSet.overview: Dynamic duo Batman and Robin set out to prevent The Wizard, a black hooded mastermind, from obtaining the diamonds he needs for his nefarious plan.

imageSet.title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
imageSet.overview: Inspired by the hit animated TV series, the Batman legend continues in this all-new, original story about Batman's most difficult battle, as well as his confrontation with a mysterious villain -- the Phantasm -- who holds the key to Batman's secret past.
